tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg come to Clayton ! @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Come Taste This !!@ @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/MR9mGnwEUP

Was looking forward to unwinding on a Friday night after what has been frankly, a stressful week. Can’t go outside to the garden, even smells as I’m watching TV. Going to go upstairs & hug the air purifier. @RedIndustries2 hope you’re happy. #StoptheStink #CloseIt

@ReebsBee @Samanth33412592 @annjsmall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA That’s it in a nutshell. They make us thankful for one night of respite until we remember some other part of the community is going through hell. Very sad times. #StopTheStink

@a_merrydew @HelenVi00175623 @davemh72 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off @JournoJess_ @StinkStopthe @Helenri51988976 Im sorry to hear this. We find it unbearable having it at some point every day. Having it all the time is just appalling. Hope your mums ok, you’re stuck between a rock &a hard place. She will be dismayed at what you’re facing bless you ❤️

tweets.text: Heard from sources that the @EnvAgency are planning to radically change their pollution response procedure. Will now only attend serious pollution incidents. Begs the question define serious & how would they know if they do not attend? Replace one broken system with another.

What a joke the authorities are fast becoming! @MattHancock  @EnvAgency @PHE_uk even considering this work by the same organisation that cannot run a compliant landfill just a few miles short away is a crime! Red are making a mockery of you! #failedprocess @StinkStopthe https://t.co/hotenh5Mbe

tweets.text:
I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

https://t.co/zslGdsV3lC

tweets.text: We have been focussing on the #IsleofWight over the last few days both on shore & at sea. IFCOs have been checking compliance with fisheries regulations, one offence recorded in relation to a breach of the SaFFA, we are liaising with our @EnvAgency counterparts. #FisheriesPatrol https://t.co/xZiSJ5k9qr

Today the team have worked with @EnvAgency & @AnglingTrust at #Hanningfieldresevoir to check for poaching & theft offences. Multiple licences checked with persons reported for not having rod licences. A good day of partnership working despite the 🌧. @PCJedRaven https://t.co/YaM7cTVF1e

@SFRS_MDrayton @SFRS_Wellington @SFRS_CWhite @SFRS_atm @SFRS_Scott_H @SFRS_GWilliams @StaffsFire @HWFire @EnvAgency @WMerciaPolice Excellent work team, a huge thank you to you all, your families and employers for your continued support 🙏🏻

Charities are stepping in to save children living in Newcastle under Lyme. Schools are sending letters about how toxic landfill gas is affecting children’s education. The situation is escalating. Yet @EnvAgencyMids is allowing waste back on site at Walley’s Quarry. #stopthestink https://t.co/SchV09qw1x

Some good partnership working between @EP_RURAL @EnvAgencyAnglia @AnglingTrust, along with staff from @ESWH2O around @EPChelmsford @EPMaldon areas. #HanningfieldReservoir, #HeybridgeBasin  #PaperMillLock to tackle #Poaching, #IllegalFishing @IWA_UK @PcAndyLong 
#opclampdown9 https://t.co/c77m2UIeJ4

"The site has been breached for discharges from storm tanks during non-storm conditions."

In English. Berkhamsted STW is operating illegally by dumping sewage into the River Bulbourne, a chalk stream, 1 of only 225 in the entire world.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/SCyPhZUuaR

Mothers in labor been moved to other hospitals to escape the gas and your allowing this to continue shame on you #StopTheStink @EnvAgency @MattHancock @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK step up before it’s to late @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @StaffordshireCC @AaronBell4NUL this is horrendous https://t.co/kQ5thVlgE3

tweets.text: Please sign the petition. @AnglianWater dumped raw sewage in the Lark for 439 hours in 2021, according to the @EnvAgency https://t.co/iik6D9Xdi2 https://t.co/re8LD6i2U3

@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe RED have applied to increase work at Sneyd Hill Ind Estate.
@EnvAgencyMids SAY NO! The smell from there is already ghastly & has need been reported on before It drifts across High Lane, Stanfields (School & Hospital) & Acreswood. No more stink!

Thanks @SimonTagg - can we see some hard bargaining with strict timelines & holding the @EnvAgency to account. Would also like to hear if @MPGeorgeEustice responded to your request for a public enquiry into the regulators mismanagement of the disaster @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/kBNQW6hBfd
Get these monsters out of our town @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @NewsNBC @StaffordshireCC @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/mN9ziRq1yy

tweets.text: @davemh72 @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @WHO @EnvAgencyMids There are lots of evidence based and peer reviewed articles that detail similar impacts. The second article I just posted details organ damage with chronic low level exposure to an adult male @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @PHE_uk .

@TheRealMother2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @NewsNBC @Cap_it_off @PHE_uk It must be exhausting for the parents of young children right now in Newcastle with all this going on .  It’s bad enough in normal times .
@Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/DyKZDN6ky1

tweets.text: @annjsmall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA This morning I woke up and could actually smell fresh air 🤯 then I realised someone else would be bearing the brunt of it. I am so sorry you have to endure this nearly all of the time. Who would believe it in 2021? Unbelievable!!

With the end of election publicity restrictions I am back as lead spokesperson for @NewsNBC our councillors and officers speak as one when we urge further action by @EnvAgencyMids to relieve the foul gas stink from Walleys Quarry landfill. @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/8gj36tg4D2
@TheRealMother2 @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @WHO @EnvAgencyMids I'm particularly concerned by this excerpt https://t.co/tmZTZtV8Fs

@EnvAgencyMids I'm fed up of you saying there's unlikely to be 'long-term' health impacts. What about our stress & anxiety levels? Sleep deprivation? Our inability to go outside for exercise? I've cried every day this week because the odour has worsened. We've had no respite from this hell.

@PHE_uk I think you need to review and publish the highest 15/ 30 minute averages not a watered down 24hr average which was still over @WHO limits. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #HumanRights @EnvAgencyMids 

https://t.co/a4FLq9MsPe

Another shift at #GreenwayPolymers incident in #Ketley🔥 Crew working with colleagues from @SFRS_Wellington 👩🏻‍🚒👨🏻‍🚒 Officer support from @SFRS_CWhite @SFRS_cjackson @SFRS_atm @SFRS_Scott_H @SFRS_GWilliams 🚗 Support from @StaffsFire @HWFire @EnvAgency @WMerciaPolice 🚒♻️🚓 #OneTeam https://t.co/xcDCnvjKCK

@SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @RedIndustries2 There is no shame in admitting that you need help to manage this site. It is, however, shameful to prolong the suffering of thousands of people for profit or to save face.

🌧🚨Rainy Day Alert🚨🌧
This sewer by Richmond Park overflowed to the Beverley Brook 141 times in 2020.
Is it spilling now?
We want Thames Water to put them online in real-time.
Send our email & put them under pressure: https://t.co/RTgQMczDZ3 https://t.co/IHuXpRlzkm

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @MattHancock One day you could see a Public Inquiry into this. It's unbelievable that it is continuing and damaging people's physical and mental health and quality of life. Public representatives need to act NOW!

tweets.text: @davemh72 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @NewsNBC @Cap_it_off @PHE_uk We are all spending so much mental capacity working together, but it is exhausting!! If not worrying about the children, I am checking if the wind direction will change & ensuring no air can enter when it does.@PHE_uk @StinkStopthe #MentalHealthMatters
@EnvAgencyMids Excuse me but it STILL STINKS and it’s still poisoning us.  Anything else is mere detail.   SOLUTIONS please.

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

Why are we been left to suffer it’s the weekend and yet again it’s worse than ever just close it down and sort it out @RedIndustries2 are not controlling the gas help us #StopTheStink @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock @BorisJohnson please someone do something https://t.co/k8C6AJ96W4

tweets.text:
https://t.co/9wX7a8zVSx
Recognise this? @EnvAgency is not fit for purpose! Odour for years.. no firm action has led to an #environmentaldisaster. An independent enquiry to audit actions undertaken as a result of our complaints is essential. @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC https://t.co/RyMPNaKxAQ

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA  It may be complete but we are still breathing in poisonous gases. So what’s next? More statements or are you going to do the right thing and close it down? #StopTheStink
@Feargal_Sharkey @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency With hydrogen sulfide , all the authorities do is trawl out the same bilge daily .

@Feargal_Sharkey @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency Absolutely nothing ! Here in Newcastle under Lyme they’ve let a private carrying accepting waste despite thousands of complaints a month , 1200 impact statements going in and an acknowledgement there’s a problem .

@nelliephant @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids My hunch is that they have been doing that here too to release the gas. The agencies who are checking how these landfill sites are being managed need to be more robust. Are the operators breaking the law? This needs to be investigated.

I don’t think anyone understands why it’s allowed to continue. The only answer we can come up with for some illogical and unsafe decision making is money. Wealth before health @Cap_it_off  @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/dWnPdI6WVs

tweets.text: @a_merrydew @HelenVi00175623 @davemh72 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off @JournoJess_ @StinkStopthe @Helenri51988976 Sorry it’s back again. It’s relentless at the moment. We don’t get it as much in the day. It’s more evening / overnight for us. We’ve escaped for a bit to my MILs (bubble) hope it’s not there when we return!didn’t sleep well at all,pattern of disturbed sleep. How about you? X

tweets.text:
UPDATE 8/5/21 from @SFRS_GWilliams 
We are expecting the smoke plume to increase and decrease through the day due to activities. This will be monitored by partners for air quality and also the impacts on the M54. @shropsfire @TelfordWrekin @BBCShropshire @EnvAgency @bbcmtd https://t.co/cgI2GeY57u

Are they opening up the wells to release the gas in the evenings / weekends? Don’t see how it can be this bad at weekends every weekend without some sort of human interference @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/A33irmt6RO

Time to fight back. Higher than the @EnvAgency - @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice Shout until they listen. After that I’m afraid it’s @BorisJohnson Don’t want to bother him. He’s a busy man but what choice do we have ?! @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @MattHancock https://t.co/ClEPRR0CxO
